items.title: HUL chooses investors’ favourite flavour for ice cream demerger
items.description: A separately-listed company post-demerger gives investors the options for staying invested in a business with high growth potential or divesting it if they don’t have the appetite for it

items.title: Karur Vysya Bank — good quality at reasonable valuation
items.description: Negligible exposure to unsecured may help the bank to throw up positive surprises
